name: Hairdryer
description: A hairdryer is a device that blows hot or cold air into damp hair to speed the evaporation of water to dry the hair.

name: Electric Toothbrush
description: An electric toothbrush is a toothbrush that makes rapid automatic bristle motions to clean the teeth.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Wireless headphones are headphones that connect to a device, such as a smartphone, stereo speaker, television, gaming console, computer, or other electronic devices without using a wire or cable.
